data.caption: Intimation - Smt. Bhuvaneswari Nara Conferred With IODS Distinguished Fellowship - 2025
data.news_body: Smt. Bhuvaneswari Nara Vice Chairperson & Managing Director of the Company has been conferred with the prestigious IODs Distinguished Fellowship - 2025 by the Institute of Directors (IOD) India at the IOD Annual London Global Convention on Corporate Governance & Sustainability being held on Tuesday November 04 2025 in London (UK).

data.caption: Intimation Regarding Receipt Of Prestigious Award Golden Peacock Award For Excellence In Corporate Governance 2025
data.news_body:
The Company has been awarded the prestigious Golden Peacock Award for Excellence in Corporate Governance 2025 by the Institute of Directors (IOD) India at the IOD Annual London Global Convention on Corporate Governance & Sustainability held on Tuesday November 04 2025 in London (UK). 

The award was received on behalf of the Company by Smt. Bhuvaneswari Nara Vice- Chairperson & Managing Director and Sri. Umakanta Barik Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the Company.

Bhuvaneswari Nara Vice Chairperson & Managing Director of the Company to be conferred with the prestigious IODs Distinguished Fellowship - 2025. data.caption: Intimation For Wining Of Golden Peacock Award For Excellence In Corporate Governance 2025
data.news_body:
We are delighted to share that the Company has been declared the winner of the Golden Peacock Award for Excellence in Corporate Governance for the year 2025 by the Institute of Directors (IOD).

The Awards will be presented at a specially organized Golden Peacock Awards Presentation Ceremony & Banquet on Tuesday November 04 2025 at London (UK) during IOD Indias 2025 Annual London Global Convention on Corporate Governance & Sustainability.
